The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 February is 3,442,495 (6,116 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 February, there were 137,624 new confirmed cases (244.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 January, there were 186,073 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 26% (48,449 fewer cases).
